price: следите оне који од вас не траже никакву награду, а на Правом су путу!
arabic: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَن لَّا يَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ أَجۡرٗا وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ittabiʿū man lā yasalukum ajran wahum muh'tadūna
